sense.def:
Beseda
this
označuje osebo ali stvar, ki smo jo že omenili ali ki je navzoča, lahko pa tudi nekaj, kar se dogaja zdaj.

seg.quote: This was a sad end to her career.
So, for all these reasons, my advice is to be very, very careful.
This is Desiree, my father's second wife.
Get these kids out of here.

sense.def:
z izrazom
this
uvedemo novo osebo ali stvar v zgodbo.

seg.quote: I stopped at a junction and this bowler-hatted gent comes up.

sense.def:
Izraz
this
se nanaša na sedanjost.

seg.quote: Could I make an appointment to see the doctor this morning please?

sense.def:
Izraz
this
ob imenih dnevov ali drugih časovnih enot, na primer
Friday
ali
summer
, pomeni ‘prvi naslednji’.

seg.quote: Let's fix a time. This Sunday. Four o'clock.

sense.def:
Izraz
this and that
pomeni najrazličnejše stvari.

seg.quote: ‘What have you been up to ?’—‘This and that.’
